title: How to Sign Up for a New Google Voice Phone Number

steps.title: Go to https://voice.google.com in your computer's web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://voice.google.com in your computer's web browser. This will open the Google Voice setup page. [1] X Research source If you aren't logged into a Google account, click Sign in in the top-right corner. Enter your email address and password before proceeding. You must have a Google account , a valid U.S. phone number, and be located in the U.S. to get a Google Voice phone number.

steps.title: Tap Continue.
steps.content: Tap Continue . This is the green button at the center of the page.

steps.title: Search for a location.
steps.content: Search for a location. Click the text box in the middle of the page, then type in a city name or a ZIP code (e.g., 96703 ). As you type, a drop-down menu with phone number options will appear below the text box.

steps.title: Select a phone number.
steps.content: Select a phone number. Click Select to the right of the phone number that you want to use. [2] X Research source You may first have to select a city in the drop-down menu below the search bar.

steps.title: Click Verify.
steps.content: Click Verify . This green button is in the middle of the page. You'll be taken to a page where you can verify your actual phone number. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Enter your valid phone number.
steps.content: Enter your valid phone number. In the text field that appears in the middle of the page, type in a phone number for a phone that you can access.

steps.title: Click SEND CODE.
steps.content: Click SEND CODE . It's in the bottom-right corner of the phone number window. Google Voice will send a verification text to your phone. [4] X Research source

steps.title: Retrieve your code.
steps.content: Retrieve your code. Open your phone's texting app, open the text from Google (usually a five-digit number), and review the six-digit code in the body of the text. Google's text will say something like "123456 is your Google Voice verification code."

steps.title: Enter the code.
steps.content: Enter the code. Type the six-digit code into the text field in the middle of the Google Voice page. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Click Verify.
steps.content: Click Verify . It's in the bottom-right corner of the code verification window. [6] X Research source

steps.title: Click Claim when prompted.
steps.content: Click Claim when prompted. This will confirm that you want to use the associated phone number with your Google Voice account. You might not see this option depending on your phone number. If so, skip to the next step.

steps.title: Click Finish when prompted.
steps.content: Click Finish when prompted. Doing so will confirm your phone number and take you to your Google Voice page. You can now use Google Voice. Any outgoing messages or phone calls from this page will use your Google Voice number.

steps.title: Set up Google Voice
steps.content: Set up Google Voice . Click the cog icon in the top-right corner to access your Settings . You'll be able to adjust your call settings, voicemail, notifications, and accessibility. Make a phone call by entering a number in the keypad on the right side of the home page. Click the phone icon to dial. You must have a connected microphone . To text with Google Voice , click the message icon in the left panel. Click Send new message , add a recipient and message, then click the airplane icon to send.

steps.title: Go to https://voice.google.com/ in your web browser.
steps.content: Go to https://voice.google.com/ in your web browser. If you aren't logged into a Google Account, enter your email address and password before proceeding. You can reclaim your old number within 90 days if it's your only Google Voice phone number. You can only change your Google Voice number once per year.

steps.title: Click the cog icon.
steps.content: Click the cog icon. This will be in the top-right corner, next to a question mark icon. [7] X Research source Your Settings will open. By default, you'll be in the Account tab.

steps.title: Click Delete.
steps.content: Click Delete . This will be underneath your current Google Voice number. [8] X Research source A new window will open.

steps.title: Click Delete number.
steps.content: Click Delete number . Your number will be deleted. [9] X Research source

steps.title: Click Get a number.
steps.content: Click Get a number . This will be underneath the Account header. The Delete button should have shifted to this button. [10] X Research source This will begin the Google Voice set up again. Follow the steps to Signing up for Google Voice to claim a new number.
